plot outline: Having lost his father at the tender of age of 1, Madhavrao grew up to be a shrewd political leader and champion of justice. However, he was constantly faced with political intrigues and conspiracies of his father's brother, Raghunathrao. At one point, even his maternal uncle joined hands with the Maratha's arch-rival, the Nizam. But when Madhavrao punished him for treason, his own mother vowed that she would never look at Madhavrao's face again. At the young age of 27, Madhavrao died after a short illness, yearning to see his mother's face. He is still remembered as one of the greatest Peshwas despite dying so young.
title: Hee Shrinchi Ichha
plot: _Hee Shrinchi Ichha_ (qv) depicts the life and times of Madhavrao Peshwa who was the Prime Minister of Pune between 1761-1772.

Having lost his father at the tender of age of 1, Madhavrao grew up to be a shrewd political leader and champion of justice. However, he was constantly faced with political intrigues and conspiracies of his father's brother, Raghunathrao. At one point, even his maternal uncle joined hands with the Maratha's arch-rival, the Nizam. But when Madhavrao punished him for treason, his own mother vowed that she would never look at Madhavrao's face again. At the young age of 27, Madhavrao died after a short illness, yearning to see his mother's face. He is still remembered as one of the greatest Peshwas despite dying so young.::Everest Entertainment
